00014 void Uart_Init(int buadrate){
00015         /* pin selection for the UART*/
00016     PINSEL0 |= (1<<0); //TXD for the UART0
00017     PINSEL0 |= (1<<2); //RxD for the UART0
00018     
00019         U0LCR = 0x83;   //8 bit length ,DLAB=1             
00020         U0DLL = (864000/buadrate);      //Fpclk/(16*buadrate);
00021         U0DLM = 0x00;
00022         U0LCR = 0x03;    //DLAB=0
00023         return;
00024 }

00035 void Uart_SendInt(int num){
00036     int digi;
00037         int i;
00038         digi=numDigi(num);
00039         if (num<0){
00040                 Uart_Print("-");
00041                 num = -1*num;
00042         }       
00043         for (i=digi-1;i>=0;i--){
00044                 Uart_SendChar('0'+(int)(num/pow10(i))%10);
00045         }       
00046         return;
00047 }

00056 void Uart_SendChar(char ch){    /*send an char*/
00057         while( (U0LSR&0x40)==0 );    
00058         U0THR  = ch; // Transmit next character
00059 }
00060 
00068 void Uart_Print(char *p){               /*send a string*/
00069         while(*p!='\0') {
00070       Uart_SendChar(*p++);
00071    }
00072    return;
00073 }
00074 
00082 char Uart_GetChar(void){                /*get a char from the computer*/
00083         volatile char ch = '0';
00084         while ((U0LSR&0x1)==0);         // wait until  receive a byte
00085         ch = U0RBR;                     // receive character
00086         return ch;
00087 }
00088 
00096 void Uart_SendBit(int num){     /*send a 1 place number*/
00097      Uart_SendChar('0'+ num);
00098          return;
00099 }
00100 
00109 void Uart_SendFloat(float num){
00110         int copy;
00111         if (num<0){
00112                 Uart_Print("-");
00113                 num = -1*num;
00114         }
00115         copy=(int)num; //print the first part as integer
00116         Uart_SendInt(copy); //print the decimal part
00117         Uart_SendChar('.');
00118         Uart_SendChar('0'+(int)(num*10)%10);
00119         Uart_SendChar('0'+(int)(num*100)%10);
00120         Uart_SendChar('0'+(int)(num*1000)%10);
00121         Uart_SendChar('0'+(int)(num*10000)%10);
00122         
00123         return;
00124 }

00138 void Uart_FixSendInt(int num,int digit){        /*send an integer*/
00139         int _num = num;
00140         int i;
00141         if (_num < 0){
00142                 Uart_SendChar('-');
00143                 _num = -1 * _num;
00144         }else{
00145                 Uart_SendChar('+');
00146         }       
00147 
00148         for(i = digit; i >= 0; --i){
00149                 Uart_SendChar('0'+ (_num / pow10(i) % 10));     
00150         }
00151         return;
00152 }
